title: Chapter 1880 - Divine Emissary
body:
Chapter 1880 - Divine Emissary

The sky was bright and clear. The distant sea of clouds churned, and flowing golden light flashed.

Su Yi sat languidly in the ritual grounds, holding a branch covered in fiery peach blossoms and resting his eyes. His relaxed, leisurely bearing calmed Tang Yuyan and Tang Bao’er down even as the other Tang clansmen quivered with fright.

Shortly afterward, an old man in Confucian robes appeared in the ritual grounds.

“Ancestor!” Elder Tang Jinhong and the others cried out excitedly; it seemed they’d found their pillar of support.

The Tang clansmen watching from afar relaxed too. They were overcome with excitement. This was Tang Yuejin, a Great Martial Stage powerhouse!

But against all expectations, when Tang Yuejin arrived, he paused to straighten up his clothes, then faced Su Yi and bowed solemnly.

“Junior Tang Yuejin greets you, Sovereign of the Eternal Night!”

Boom!

The crowd was instantly in uproar, like a pot blowing off its lid. Everyone felt as if they’d been struck by lightning.

Sovereign of the Eternal Night! Who could that possibly refer to but Wang Ye ...
